itemDescription: British writer of crime and thriller novels

wikipedia_page.main: John Hutton (born 1928) is a British writer of crime and thriller novels. He was born in Manchester and educated at Burnage Grammar School and the University of Wales. He has been a teacher and a senior lecturer in English.
